testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.content: EduTracker helped me transition into tech. The course tracking and progress visualization kept me motivated throughout my learning journey!

testimonials.name: Marcus Rodriguez
testimonials.content: Amazing platform for organizing my professional development. The lesson management system is intuitive and powerful.

testimonials.name: Sarah Kim
testimonials.content: The best learning platform I've used. Being able to track my progress across multiple courses has been game-changing.

about.title: About EduTracker ðŸ“š
about.mission: Our mission is to empower learners worldwide with intuitive course management and progress tracking tools.
about.intro: At EduTracker, we believe education should be accessible, organized, and engaging. Our platform helps students and professionals achieve their learning goals efficiently.

quality.title: Quality Learning
quality.desc: We provide tools that enhance the learning experience.

accessible.title: Accessible Education
accessible.desc: Learning opportunities should be available to everyone, everywhere.

progress.title: Progress Tracking
progress.desc: Visualize your learning journey and celebrate achievements.

story.title: Our Story
story.desc: Founded in 2024, EduTracker began as a solution to help learners organize their educational journey effectively.
story.content: Today, thousands of students, professionals, and educators use our platform to track progress, manage courses, and achieve their learning objectives. We're committed to making education more organized and accessible for everyone.
